rules_text: When Edgeland Sentry enters the battlefield, teach target creature you control vigilance. [i](Put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“They bide their time, but the godless rebels will come for us. And when they do, I will be the first to know.”[/i]
